content: as it s nearly christmas a lot of you are looking for nice and easy star/snowflake patterns i create a new pattern every year and to be honest it became a little tradition now ❄️ the **helina snowflake** is a nice little gift for christmas and a great stocking filler too it can be used as a decoration just make a bunch of them or create a garland and hang it on the wall the possibilities are endless it works up super fast and it s easy enough for an advanced beginner as it has a **full step-by-step photo tutorial ** exclusively available on my blog ** here 1 ** you can also download a **print friendly version** completely free from my ravelry store **special thanks to my testers ** *cheryl freeman rebecca urrutia* **difficulty ** advanced beginner/intermediate **finished size ** 12 cm/ 5 on widest point **materials needed ** 4 mm g size hook 13 metres/15 yards 5 grams of dk weight yarn * i used **scheepjes twinkle** in different shades * ***note if you crochet loosely i advise you to use a 3 5 mm e size hook*** yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * **us terms** used throughout **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2023/12/06/helina-snowflake/
